name: Inside (itch) (rloft123)
description:
A little "game" I made just to help me learn Unity, figured I would upload it for any Inside fans to quickly play. Included a couple quick scene recreations from the special.

You can play the scenes with the piano, walk around, interact with the door (don't go outside), and most importantly press F to cry.

Basic WASD move controls, to interact with the piano or door walk up close and click them.

Press Escape when you're done (didn't add a menu).

The music and scenes are direct covers from Bo Burnham's Inside on Netflix, so I'll take no donations, this was just for fun.
